phrases: It is about twenty minutes away.
I-Is Mr. Joseph Joestar the only passenger?
The entire crew is from the Speedwagon Foundation.
The Stand Chili Pepper can only move where there is electricity,
but I am sure he will do everything possible to get
over the water and onto the old man's ship.
If he gets there before we do, we lose.
The old man will be killed.
We have finished checking the boat.
He is not in the battery.
Josuke, the only ones going to the old man's boat are me and Okuyasu.
You and Koichi will stay behind at the harbor.
Josuke, Chili Pepper's user is hiding somewhere in this harbor, watching us.
He is waiting for us to make our move,
so he can confirm the boat's position.
But my guess is that he will not be using a boat.
All he needs is something with a battery that is faster than a motorboat.
Just like he did with the bike,
he will have Chili Pepper fly over in something that has a battery.
You mean it is actually going to fly through the air?
I am guessing Chili Pepper is
stealing a remote control model plane from the model shop right now.
Even model planes can travel over 100 kph!
That is faster than this motorboat.
And because Chili Pepper is controlling it,
he can keep going as long as the battery and fuel last!
The controller signal's range will not matter!
So Josuke, if you spot something flying, look for his user here at this harbor.
Koichi's Reverb has a range of 50 meters.
If he makes his move before we do, the old man is finished.
You need to protect your father from on-shore.
We do not have even a second to spare.
We will arrive at Morioh Port in about twenty minutes, Mr. Joestar.
Do you know where my cane is?
It is right in front of you.
Being told that some guy I have never met is my father is just kind of...
Well, it is different if his life's in danger.
I will not be able to sleep well unless I do my best to protect him.
Besides, I am sure my mom will bawl her eyes out if he dies.
If he had you two stay behind to find my user...
Then he completely saw through my plan to use a remote control plane!
Jotaro Kujo is a smart man.
Yeah, he is the one person I do not want finding me.
can get to Joseph Joestar in a mere five minutes.
On the other hand, a motorboat will take about eight to ten minutes.
Which means if I take care of you two in about three minutes,
I will have plenty of time to get past them.
The name's Akira Otoishi, nineteen years old.
Oh, and do not mind the guitar.
My dream is to one day be an ultra super guitarist,
like Jimi Hendrix and Jeff Beck, who lives hard and passionately!
So I keep it with me all the time.
In the near future, I am going to take my guitar
and knock out people around the world!
I never even thought that the user would show himself on his own.
That must mean he is confident that he can kill both me and Josuke!
I will only use my pinky finger against your Shining Diamond,
just like I did with Okuyasu earlier.
If you are going to use only your pinky,
then I am going to make some rules, too.
Someone like you does not need any rules!
How dare you do that, you bastard?!
Well, you said I did not need any rules.
Did not you say something about taking care of me with just your pinky?
So what are you going to do,
I am going to kill you.
Stop saying the same thing over and over, you dumbass!
What am I supposed to take it out on?
Who do I proclaim it to?!
I was able to fully express my heart!
I was able to express the ultimate rage.
I can understand his Stand moving at amazing speeds,
but the user himself was actually able to move behind me?
I saw what happened from here.
It was not Otoishi that moved...
Chili Pepper came out and turned Shining Diamond
You are facing the ocean, are not you?
I have not seen Chili Pepper at all!
See all the drainage grates around you?
His upper body came up from there just now!
There must be electrical wires running all over under there!
I am strong when I reflect on my actions.
It keeps running back into the electrical wires!
Jotaro's the only one who can keep up, after all!
You do not have time to dig up the asphalt
and cut all the wires underground, Josuke Higashikata.
And the more big holes you make in the ground...
The more places I can pop up from!
It is like insanely hard whack-a-mole!
He is moving too fast for me to tell where he will come from!
You should really stop relying on guesswork!
And I still have two minutes left...
That is plenty of time to finish you.
Koichi, watch where Chili Pepper comes from and tell me.
I cannot tell because I am too close!
Every time I think he is out, he goes back in!
You should be able to tell what I am thinking by now.
The asphalt's been turned into coal tar...
And the grates are covered by the oil film from the coal tar!
When he hit the ground earlier,
he turned the asphalt's base into something else when he fixed it!
Do not let your guard down yet.
It seems that I was not taking you seriously enough, Josuke Higashikata.
I have to give up these foolish thoughts,
I am concentrating all of Morioh's electricity on my Chili Pepper.
The reason I did not do so before
is because the electricity of this whole area, which is my power source,
would be drained to zero for a while!
But I do not care anymore!
After I defeat you two, I just need to fly over there using the RC plane's battery
All of this town's electricity is on my side!
I will be sure to tack the cost of all the electricity
I just used onto your meter.
By the time you realize it, it is probably too late.
You blew up that tire on purpose, did not you?
So you could fix it and trap my Stand inside the tire's rubber!
Tire rubber is an insulator, so it does not conduct electricity!
Chili Pepper will not be able to use electricity!
Now we just have to wait for Jotaro...
You were going to insulate me with tire rubber?
It might have worked if it were about a meter thick!
As if this flimsy rubber could have done anything!
You would have been much better off
if you did not have the power to break through that tire.
Th-The air from inside the tire!
Since the ocean's so vast, the electricity will spread out in every direction!
You said something about reflecting on your foolish thoughts,
but it seems that it is your entire character that is foolish.
So this guy is Josuke's dad...
His body's huge, but he is a rickety-looking geezer.
I am Josuke's neighbor, and I am also a Stand user.
So you are a Stand user.
I cannot seem to find my cane.
Do you know where it is?
It is right in my hand.
I have come to carry your luggage.
By the way, Osomatsu, I have a question.
Since I did not even know he was born and
left him alone these past sixteen years, has he said anything about me?
I cannot say that he is said much about that.
Yeah, that is good, I guess.
I am sort of hoping he just goes back home.
Well, I mean, I am glad he was not killed by Otoishi,
and things ended happily ever after.
I have never even met this guy before.
I cannot really see him as my parent.
I am sure it is just going to be awkward for the both of us.
Not that I have a grudge against him or anything.
But I have to think about what my mom'll think, too.
Do not you think so, Koichi?
The enemy has boarded the boat!
It appears that Akira Otoishi was not dead!
I am the one who said it!
He is not a part of the Speedwagon Foundation!
I am the one who told you about the enemy!
Would any enemy actually do that?!
I am the one who pointed out the enemy first!
He came to tell you that so you would let down your guard!
Th-That is also a good point...
This is what I get for relying on my Big Bro so much...
Jotaro has not seen my face yet.
If I can just kill Joseph...
I am going to get the hell out of here!
What is that about a chilly pigeon?
Do not think you can fool Okuyasu Nijimura twice!
H-How did you figure it out?
I was going to punch both of you!
I am not very smart, you know.
You are going to fall into the ocean.
If only I had my cane, I would be able to get down myself,
but it broke a moment ago...
G-Guess I do not have a choice.
I just had a great idea!
Why not have Shining Diamond fix the cane?
Things are better if he does not fix it this time.
retrieve the bow and arrow, it will all be over,
including the threat to this town.
Episode 13 We Picked Up Something Crazy!
Episode 13 We Picked Up Something Crazy!
